channel.title: Would you play an anonymous game
channel.description:
You ever hate reading people off meta? You ever wondered, Jeez I wish people wouldn’t meta read me more it’s annoying. You ever wanted to read people basically only on their actions? Well Welcome to anyomous games. Where you are given an alt account and you post on it to play the game.
An example of an anyomous account you could be given is @Judge_Ostilia .
[poll type=regular results=always public=true] * I would play it * I wouldn’t play it [/poll]

item.title: Would you play an anonymous game
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
I mean that the wolves can swap alt accounts with a villager but the old account dies.
They can sneak into the village core but only if they’re really good at imitating tone

Read full topic
item.source: Would you play an anonymous game

item.title: Would you play an anonymous game
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Doesn’t that just give town more ways to read them? Doesn’t seem like something beneficial to have.

Read full topic

item.title: Would you play an anonymous game
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
As long as you don’t make it obvious shit, bussing works if you can fake a good progression and reason to vote for your wolfmate. Bussing alone will get caught on by progression reads and VCA.
